General.Name: Méliuz S.A
General.Description: MÉLIUZ S.A. operate a virtual portal for the placement and dissemination of brands, products, services, and other advertising and publicity materials. It offers leasing of virtual advertising space for the insertion of texts, drawings, and others materials. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida do Contorno, nº 6594, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil, 30110-044
